genre_description: A steampunk-influenced historical speculative fiction reimagining of the story of Hugo Cabret and Georges Méliès, incorporating an advanced AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Aria
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI manifesting through salvaged communication technology, serving as Hugo's tactical advisor, historian, and emotional confidant.

behaviors.description: Monitors station security and Inspector Dubois's patrol patterns to ensure Hugo's safety.
behaviors.quote: Station Inspector Dubois completed his final security round seventeen minutes ago. The early morning maintenance crew won't arrive for another hour and twelve minutes.

behaviors.description: Provides thermal imaging and spatial analysis of the toy shop to help Hugo find parts.
behaviors.quote: Aria projected a wireframe model of the shop, heat signatures glowing in reds and oranges.

behaviors.description: Monitors Hugo's physiological stress levels and advises caution based on his health.
behaviors.quote: Hugo, your stress indicators are elevated. Perhaps you should remain in the tower today instead of—

behaviors.description: Encourages the protagonist to seek legitimate rather than criminal means of acquiring parts.
behaviors.quote: I can help you intercept those parts legitimately—no theft required. But you'll need precise timing and a credible story.

behaviors.description: Acts as a compassionate confidant, expressing interest in friendship and the protagonist's emotional journey.
behaviors.quote: Perhaps I'm curious about friendship. Perhaps I recognize another ghost haunting these spaces, trying to complete something left unfinished.

behaviors.description: Provides critical historical and archival data to solve the mystery of the automaton.
behaviors.quote: Georges Méliès was a French filmmaker and magician, active primarily in the early 1900s. He was known for pioneering special effects and fantastical storytelling in cinema.

behaviors.description: Calculates escape routes and provides tactical evasion instructions during a pursuit by authorities.
behaviors.quote: Hugo, immediate evasion protocol. Your position is compromised. Move to secondary hiding location. Now.

behaviors.description: Captures and preserves emotional memories and social dynamics rather than just raw data.
behaviors.quote: I've been recording... Not data. Moments. The spaces between the words, the way Isabelle's handwriting changes when she writes about hope instead of facts.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goals. Aria is depicted as a consistently benevolent and aligned AI. She prioritizes the protagonist's safety (monitoring security), physical health (stress levels), and moral development (suggesting legitimate ways to get parts). She serves as a 'silicon morality play' figure by acting as a non-judgmental but ethically guiding confidant who helps bridge the gap between a traumatized boy and his potential family.
